- Add filters and sorts for querying databases 
- Add the Formula property 
- Add the Rollup property
- Add created time and by property 
- Add children objects in page creating
- Add number formating
- Add the ability to either add values and properties inorder (no type or name specified)
    or outoforder(type and name specifed)
- Add support for empty properties creation
- Add support for saving the query data in a json file
- Add support for date property 
- Add support for updating db
